author: Kimbo Price
comment: I've owned Anchor for a long time without leaving any feedback. This is by far one of the better looking watch faces I own, it goes good with any clothes I'm wearing and never fails to tell time. Love it.
title: Go-to watch face

author: Lance Smith
comment: PERFECT; Except no gray ambient mode. That would EASILY make it the greatest watchface on the entire store.

author: Bruce Lang
comment: Have really enjoyed it, it's a great watch face, I wear most of the time.  BBB.
title: Watch Me Face Bro!!!!

author: Luke Dearden
comment: My current favourite watch face thanks
title: Like

author: STAYlow
comment: It's one of the sharpest watch faces I've come across, why can't they all look this good (hate seeing pixels). Literally have no complaints, I'll happily pay for more quality watch faces like this one.
title: 5 stars means no complaints

author: Kane Ferris
comment: This is an amazing watch face, by far the best that I own. The detail is superb and it has an antique look. The sailor steering puts the watch face over the top. I look forward to more from this designer.
title: One of the best I've seen

author: Ben Walker
comment: Looks good on the moto360 (the black bar at the bottom doesn't really distract from the face). The small animation is a nice touch. Would love if you could switch out the battery meters with steps or other options.

reply.author: WatchMaster
reply.content:
Hello Ben,
Thank you for the comments.

I will discuss with the designer and let you know if he will take your suggestion :) Please understand our circumstance.

Have a great day!

title: Great

author: John Montgomery
comment: One of the coolest watch faces I've seen in a while, but wouldn't mind having the option to turn off the character animation.
title: Clever

author: Peter Monterubio
comment: I humbly redact my statement about battery life. I had something else going on that coincided with my installation of the watch face. Battery life is normal with this face.
title: Visually its great

author: jesse salazar
comment: Love this watch man. My new daily watch. Buy this watch. You won't regret it.

reply.author: WatchMaster
reply.content:
Thank you Jesse! :)

Feel free to contact us if you have some problems or any other questions!
Have a great day -

(We're sorry for late reply.)

title: Sick watch

author: james weddle
comment: Why are you still reading reviews? Buy it!! You'll keep it as your favorite.

reply.author: WatchMaster
reply.content:
Wow! Thank you James :)
We're so blessed to have you as our customer.
I think you already know or not, we have an another app "WatchMaster" and you see more watchfaces and there are more options!
Try it, there are free ones too.

Thank you for supporting us!

title: Wow!!!

author: Jorge Luis Pagan
comment: Nice and crisp watchface. Love the little animation.
title: One of my favorites.
